article.title: Chatfield Assigned as U.S. Pacific Command Representative
article.text: Rear Adm. Shoshana S. Chatfield, USN, will be assigned as U.S. Pacific Command representative, Guam, Commonwealth of the Northern Mariana Islands, Federated States of Micronesia, Republic of Palau; commander, U.S. Naval Forces, Marianas; and commander, Joint Region Marianas, Guam.
